sentences.en: Can measure frequency and cycle. 8846 A still can measure capacitance and temperature.
sentences.cn: 能够测量频率和周期. 8846A还能够测量电容和温度.

sentences.en: Can you ship Trimmer Capacitors with the angle and capacitance value preset?
sentences.cn: 你们可以提供带预设角和电容值的微调电容器 吗 ?

sentences.en: Capacitance from the switch contacts to the coil is typically 0.2 –15 pF.
sentences.cn: 开关触点与线圈之间的电容通常在0.2～15pF之间.

sentences.en: Features: Excellent self - healing, high capacitance rate, low, high reliability.
sentences.cn: 特点: 具有良好自愈性 、 比率容量大 、 损耗低 、 可靠性高.

sentences.en: Features: High gain bandwidth product, small output capacitance, low noise figure.
sentences.cn: 特点: 产品增益带宽高, 输出电容小, 噪声系数低.

sentences.en: Have excellent frequency characteristic and small deviation of Capacitance.
sentences.cn: 具容量误差小,频率响应高之特质.

sentences.en: HBTs : Concept: emitter efficiency, base transport, base resistance, junction capacitance.
sentences.cn: 概念: 射极效率, 基极传输, 基极阻抗, 接面电容.

sentences.en: Inductance - capacitance circuit having infinite reactance, zero susceptance at resonance.
sentences.cn: 谐振时阻抗无穷大, 电纳为零的电感-电容电路.

sentences.en: Sampling of propellants under typical operating conditions may be necessary to obtain valid capacitance information.
sentences.cn: 为了获得有效的容量资料,在典型的工作条件下对推进剂取样是很必要的.

sentences.en: The ability of a capacitor to store electrical energy is termed capacitance.
sentences.cn: 电容器存储电能的能力叫电容.

sentences.en: The effect of the diffusion capacitance can be troublesome.
The effects of inductance and capacitance make it necessary to carefully design all AC transmission systems.
sentences.cn: 电感和电容的影响,使人们必须精心地设计所有的交流输电系统.

sentences.en: The unknown capacitance should be in a shielded test fixture.
sentences.cn: 应当将未知电容放在屏蔽的测试夹具中.

sentences.en: This change of capacitance value can be detected by TS.
sentences.cn: TS可以探测到电容量的这种变化.

sentences.en: With sufficient forward bias, the diffusion capacitance can easily exceed the space charge region capacitance.
sentences.cn: 当正向偏压足够高时, 扩散电容很容易超过空间电荷压电容.

words.tran_cn: 能力；容量；资格，地位；生产力

trans.tran_en: the property of a system that enables it to store electric charge
